Author: polyfractal
Content: given how big GF's SRAM blocks are at the small end (64 words is half the size of 512!), do you think it'd end up being more area-efficient to just use registers/flip flops for small "sram-like" banks? say 16 words / 128 bits?

Content: (suppose it's easy enough to try it out heh)
